entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:19 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 1:43 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -12.2°C
Wind: NE 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
